overview.name: Poulami Das
overview.label: Quantum Computing Researcher
overview.summary: Quantum computing researcher specializing in error-correction techniques and fault-tolerant quantum computing. Experienced in designing hardware architectures and software frameworks for near-term quantum computers.

title: IEEE MICRO Top Picks Honorable Mention for Astrea Paper
Georgia Tech ECE’s Nominee for ACM Doctoral Dissertation Award
Selected as a Fellow of the AMD Chair in Computer Engineering, UT Austin
Selected as a Rising Star in EECS, UT Austin
Invited to the 7th Workshop on the Future of Computing Architectures, IBM Research
Invited to the 9th Heidelberg Laureate Forum
Best Research Award, Ph.D. Forum, Design Automation Conference
Colonel Oscar P. Cleaver Award for the Most Outstanding PhD Dissertation Proposal (Georgia Tech)
Best Paper Award for 'A Case for Superconducting Accelerators' at Computing Frontiers
Distinguished Alumnus of Ashok Hall Group of Schools, Kolkata
Institute Gold Medal for Highest Distinction in B. Tech, NIT Durgapur
Institute Gold Medal for Overall Scholastic Excellence in B. Tech, NIT Durgapur
